Trenton.Brock Creek (Buck Creek):
Brock Creek is a tributary of Buck Creek, rising in Lower Makefield Township, Bucks County, Pennsylvania, and meets its confluence at Buck Creek's 0.60 river mile in Yardley Borough.


== Statistics ==
The Geographic Name Information System I.D. is 1170304, U.S. Department of the Interior Geological Survey I.D. is 02946.


== Course ==
Brock Creek rises near the southwest corner of Lower Makefield Township just east of Interstate 95 flowing generally east then northeast, turning northerly before it enters Yardley Borough.
